verbs.description: [ARG0: A coalition of conservation groups] [V: sued] [ARG1: the Trump administration] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] , [ARGM-ADV: accusing the government of slashing protections for migratory birds] .
[ARG0: A coalition of conservation groups] sued the Trump administration on Thursday , [V: accusing] [ARG1: the government] [ARG2: of slashing protections for migratory birds] .
